titles.title: What A Wonderful, Wonderful God Up In Heaven

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a wonderful, wonderful God up in heaven.
What a wonderful, wonderful God up in heaven.
What a wonderful, wonderful God up in heaven.
What a wonderful, wonderful God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He gave Elijah the power to pray down the fire (3x)
What a wonderful, wonderful God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He gave Peter the power to walk on the water (3x)
What a wonderful, wonderful God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He gave Jesus the power to go to perfection (3x)
What a wonderful, wonderful God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He gave us the power to destroy the devil (3x)
What a wonderful, wonderful God.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: He gave me the power to die to my own nature (3x)
